alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Allegany; Washington (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 02 at 4:16AM EST until December 02 at 8:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...In Maryland, Washington and Central and Eastern Allegany Counties. In Virginia, Madison, Culpeper, Southern Fauquier and Central and Southeast Prince William/Manassas/Manassas Park Counties. In West Virginia, Morgan and Berkeley Counties. * WHEN...Until 8 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
